description: monday.com is a customizable work management platform for project planning, collaboration, and automation, supporting agile, sales, marketing, and more

capabilities.name: MONDAY_ADD_USERS_TO_BOARD
capabilities.description: Adds users to a Monday.com board with a specified role.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_ADD_USERS_TO_TEAM
capabilities.description: Tool to add users to a Monday.com team. Use when updating team membership by adding user(s).

capabilities.name: MONDAY_ADD_USERS_TO_WORKSPACE
capabilities.description: Tool to add one or more users to a workspace. Use when inviting existing users to collaborate in a workspace.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_ARCHIVE_BOARD
capabilities.description: Archives a specified, existing, and unarchived board in Monday.com; archived boards can typically be restored later.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_ARCHIVE_ITEM
capabilities.description: Archives an existing Monday.com item, moving it from active board views to the archive where it can be potentially restored.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_ARCHIVE_WORKSPACE
capabilities.description: Tool to archive a Monday.com workspace. Use when you want to soft-remove a workspace from view.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_CHANGE_SIMPLE_COLUMN_VALUE
capabilities.description: Changes a specific column's value for a Monday.com item using a simple string, suitable for Text, Status, or Dropdown columns; can create new labels if `create_labels_if_missing` is true for Status/Dropdown columns.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_CREATE_BOARD
capabilities.description: Creates a Monday.com board; `template_id` if used must be accessible, and `folder_id` must be in `workspace_id` if both are provided.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_CREATE_COLUMN
capabilities.description: Creates a new column with a specified type and title on a monday.com board.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_CREATE_DOC
capabilities.description: Tool to create a new doc in Monday.com. Use when you need to add a doc to a workspace or into a doc column on an item.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_CREATE_GROUP
capabilities.description: Creates a new group with the given `group_name` on an existing Monday.com board, identified by its `board_id`.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_CREATE_ITEM
capabilities.description: Creates a new item on a Monday.com board, optionally assigning it to a group and setting column values.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_CREATE_NOTIFICATION
capabilities.description: Tool to send a notification to a user. Use when you need to alert a user about a board, item, or update. Call after obtaining the user and target IDs.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_CREATE_TAG
capabilities.description: Tool to create a new tag or return an existing tag. Use when you need to label items with color-coded tags on a public or private board.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_CREATE_UPDATE
capabilities.description: Tool to create a new update for an item or reply to an existing update. Use after determining the target item or update to comment on.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_CREATE_USER
capabilities.description: Tool to invite and create a new user. Use when you need to programmatically add new users to your Monday account.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_CREATE_WORKSPACE
capabilities.description: Tool to create a Monday.com workspace. Use when you need to programmatically add a workspace after planning your project structure.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_DELETE_ASSET
capabilities.description: Tool to remove uploaded files. Since monday.com doesn't provide a direct asset deletion API, this tool deletes the enclosing update or clears files from a File column.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_DELETE_BOARD
capabilities.description: Tool to permanently delete a board from your Monday.com account. Use when you need to remove a board permanently after verifying its ID. This action cannot be undone.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_DELETE_COLUMN
capabilities.description: Deletes a specified column from a Monday.com board; this action is destructive and cannot be undone via the API.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_DELETE_DOC
capabilities.description: Tool to delete a Monday.com doc by its ID. Use when you need to remove a doc that is no longer needed.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_DELETE_GROUP
capabilities.description: Permanently deletes an existing group (and its items) from an existing board in Monday.com.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_DELETE_ITEM
capabilities.description: Permanently deletes an existing Monday.com item; this action is irreversible via the API.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_DELETE_TAG
capabilities.description: Tool to process deletion of a tag. Note: monday.com's public API does not currently support permanently deleting a tag across the account. As a best-effort, this action validates that the tag exists and returns its id.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_DELETE_TEAM
capabilities.description: Tool to delete an existing team; use when you need to permanently remove a team by its ID after confirming it’s no longer needed.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_DELETE_UPDATE
capabilities.description: Tool to delete an update by its ID. Use when an update is no longer relevant. Use after confirming deletion is irreversible.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_DELETE_USER
capabilities.description: Tool to deactivate or remove a user by ID. Use when you need to permanently disable a user's access; operation cannot be undone.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_DELETE_WORKSPACE
capabilities.description: Tool to permanently delete a workspace by its ID. Use when a workspace is no longer needed. Use after confirming deletion is irreversible.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_DUPLICATE_ITEM
capabilities.description: Duplicates an item on a Monday.com board, optionally including its updates.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_GET_ACCOUNT_INFO
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve account metadata and settings. Use when you need to inspect account configuration before performing account-scoped operations after authenticating.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_GET_ASSET
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve metadata for an uploaded asset. Use when you need to fetch file details by its ID after upload.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_GET_DOC
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve details of a specific doc. Use when you need to fetch a document by its ID after confirming the doc ID.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_GET_GROUP_DETAILS
capabilities.description: Retrieves details (ID, title, color, archived/deleted status) for a specific group on an accessible Monday.com board.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_GET_ME
capabilities.description: Tool to fetch the current authenticated user's profile and permissions. Use when you need to retrieve user metadata before performing other operations.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_GET_TAGS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve tags from the account. Use when you need to list all tags or filter by specific IDs.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_GET_TEAMS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve teams from Monday.com. Use when you need an overview of teams in your account.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_GET_UPDATES
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve updates for a specific item. Use when you need to fetch the conversation history tied to an item.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_GET_WEBHOOKS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve webhooks for a board. Use when you need to list all webhooks on a board.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_GET_WORKSPACES
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve workspaces. Use when you need to list workspaces with optional filtering, pagination, or ordering after authentication.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_LIST_BOARD_ITEMS
capabilities.description: Retrieves ID, name, and state for all items on a specified Monday.com board.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_LIST_BOARDS
capabilities.description: Retrieves a list of boards from a Monday.com account, supporting pagination and filtering by state.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_LIST_COLUMNS
capabilities.description: Lists all columns and their properties for a specified Monday.com `board_id`; the board must exist.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_LIST_DOCS
capabilities.description: Tool to list docs. Use when you need to retrieve docs accessible in an account or workspace.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_LIST_GROUPS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve all groups of a specified board. Use when you need to list groups on a board after confirming its board ID.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_LIST_ITEMS
capabilities.description: Retrieves specified subitems from Monday.com using their IDs, returning the raw JSON response.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_LIST_TEAM_MEMBERS
capabilities.description: Tool to list members of a specified team. Use when you need to retrieve all users in a given Monday.com team after confirming its team ID.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_LIST_USERS
capabilities.description: Retrieves a list of users from Monday.com; an empty user list in the response 'data' field does not signify action failure.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_MOVE_ITEM_TO_BOARD
capabilities.description: Moves a Monday.com item to a specified board and group; requires the item, target board, and target group to exist.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_MOVE_ITEM_TO_GROUP
capabilities.description: Moves an item to a different group on the same Monday.com board; the item and group must exist.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_REMOVE_USERS_FROM_TEAM
capabilities.description: Tool to remove users from a Monday.com team. Use when updating team membership by removing user(s).

capabilities.name: MONDAY_REMOVE_USERS_FROM_WORKSPACE
capabilities.description: Tool to remove users from a workspace. Use when revoking access for specific users in a workspace.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_UPDATE_BOARD
capabilities.description: Updates a specified attribute of an existing board on Monday.com.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_UPDATE_COLUMN
capabilities.description: Tool to update column title or description. Use when modifying a column’s metadata after creation.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_UPDATE_DOC
capabilities.description: Tool to update a doc's title or append markdown content. Use when renaming docs or adding Markdown blocks to existing docs.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_UPDATE_GROUP
capabilities.description: Tool to update an existing group on a board. Use when you need to modify a group's attribute (title, color, or position) after confirming the group ID.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_UPDATE_ITEM
capabilities.description: Tool to update an existing item's column value on Monday.com. Use when setting complex column types like Timeline or People.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_UPDATE_TAG
capabilities.description: Tool to return a tag's details or best-effort "rename" by creating or getting a tag with the requested name. The monday API does not support updating existing tag name/color.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_UPDATE_TEAM
capabilities.description: Tool to update a team's details in Monday.com. Use after identifying the team and desired changes.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_UPDATE_UPDATE
capabilities.description: Tool to edit an existing update's content. Use when you need to correct or change a previously posted update.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_UPDATE_USER
capabilities.description: Tool to update a user on Monday.com. Use when changing profile attributes like name, email, or department; ensure user ID is valid.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_UPDATE_WORKSPACE
capabilities.description: Tool to update a Monday.com workspace. Use when you need to modify the name, description, visibility, or product placement of an existing workspace.

capabilities.name: MONDAY_UPLOAD_ASSET
capabilities.description: Tool to upload a file to an update or file column. Use when you need to attach a file to an existing update or file column.
